Attributes.description: The control and integration of cardio-pulmonary function in mammals. Intended for Honours students in Cellular, Anatomical and Physiological Sciences or other life sciences.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (A cumulative average of 75% over at least 90 credits attempted in the first three years of a student's program and a minimum mark of 75% in CAPS 301 or PHYL 301 or its equivalent. Permission of the course director is also required.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 8:00, End Time: 10:00
